MITOMODEL INPUT PORTAL



SELECT ORGANISM

At present MitoModel can be generated only for human and mouse data

EXPRESSION AND/OR MUTATION DATA

To generate MitoModel:

Submit both expression and mutation data at once OR Submit either expression or mutation data

Select file Change Remove

and/or

Select file Change Remove

LEGENDS

Defines the symbols observed in the MitoModel

Symbol Name Condition
● Circle Node/gene with no mis-regulations (up/downregulated) nor mutations
▲ Up-triangle Node/gene upregulated in abnormal either with log2foldchange > 1.5 or p-value < 0.05
▼ Down-triangle Node/gene downregulated in abnormal either with log2foldchange < -1.5 or p-value < 0.05
✚ Cross Node/gene conatining one to several mutation sites
♦ Diamond Mis-regulated also contains one to several mutations

Expression File Format

Only tab seperated text file as defined below is accepted

Genename Normal Abnormal Log2Fold p-value
Slc25a34 5.14185 0.525591 -3.29027 0.04165
Ephb2 21.6398 77.9794 1.84941 0.03615
Cd52 113.979 24.01 -2.24706 0.14155
Mfsd2a 2.671 16.7198 2.64611 0.0318

Note: Only NCBI gene symbols compatible at present, above table contains mouse gene symbols

Mutation File Format

Only tab seperated text file as defined below is accepted

Genename Chromosome Position Reference Allele Varinat Allele Mutation Type Consequence
MT-CO2 M 8159 T C SNP Missense
AGO1 1 36391661 TGAA T DEL 3'UTR
ITIH1 3 52825585 T C SNP Silent
GPR35 2 241566012 G A SNP Intron

Note: Only NCBI gene symbols compatible at present, above table contains human gene symbols
